FuncDef:
The web-url-profile command configures a redirect template.
The undo web-url-profile command deletes the configured redirect template.
By default, no redirect template is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the redirect template.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The web-url-profile command is used when the RADIUS server delivers Redback private attribute 107 (redirect template name) to redirect users.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
A maximum of 128 redirect templates can be created.
If there is no corresponding redirect template when the RADIUS server delivers the redirect template name, users fail to go online.
Redback private attribute 107 is carried in only authentication replies.
